name: Raging Comet
description:
In Raging Comet you are on a mission to destroy all aliens that are heading towards Earth. How long can you last? Comment your high scores.

If you want to save your high score, download the game. Make sure you press quit in-game and not just close the window.

Raging Comet has nothing to do with comets I just thought it sounded cool.

CONTROLS:

Moving = Arrow keys

Select = Space & Enter

Shoot = Space & Enter

Pause = ESC

CREDITS:

Art made in Aseprite 1.2.25.

Game made in Godot 3.2.

SFX made with jsfxr and Famitracker

UPDATE HISTORY 1.0.0 - 4/1/2021
